generateDocument.title: Finalize & Generate Proposal
generateDocument.description: You’ve completed all the required steps. Now, generate a tailored technical proposal for your water treatment solution. Review the content after generation to ensure accuracy and alignment with client needs.

removeEquipment.title: Confirm Deletion
removeEquipment.description: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.

placeholders.type: e.g. Submersible Pump or Tube Diffuser
placeholders.head: e.g., 11.8

descriptions.type: Enter the equipment type if it is not listed in the previous options.
descriptions.price: Enter the price for a single unit of the equipment, excluding taxes or additional fees.
descriptions.casingMaterial: Indicate the material used for the equipment's outer casing.
descriptions.shaftMaterial: Enter the material used for the internal shaft.
descriptions.impellerMaterial: Specify the material of the impeller.
descriptions.valves: Mention the types of valves associated with this equipment.
descriptions.protection: Enter the ingress protection (IP) rating of the equipment.
descriptions.manufacturer: Enter the name of the company that manufactured the equipment.
descriptions.origin: State the country where the equipment was made.
descriptions.pressure: Specify the maximum working pressure in bars.
descriptions.diameter: Enter the filter diameter in millimeters (mm).
descriptions.height: Enter the effective height of the filter media in millimeters (mm).
descriptions.poreSize: Enter the pore size of the membrane in microns.
descriptions.model: Enter the model number provided by the manufacturer.

descriptions.contractDuration: Specify the duration of the contract period.
descriptions.companyName: The name of the company receiving the proposal
descriptions.contactPerson: Enter the name of the engineering manager overseeing this project.
descriptions.documentCode: A unique identifier for the document.
descriptions.jobTitle: Enter the official job title of the engineering manager responsible for the project.
descriptions.projectSubject: Enter the main topic or title of the proposal
descriptions.projectGovernorate: Select the governorate where the project is located.
descriptions.projectLocation: Enter the project’s geographical location in Egypt.
descriptions.flowRate: Specify the daily treatment capacity of the plant.
descriptions.monthlyWorks: Enter the monthly value of the proposed works, excluding tax
descriptions.offerValidity: Specify how long the financial and technical offer remains valid from the date of submission.
descriptions.workScope: Add or remove installation tasks as part of the scope of work
descriptions.paymentTerms: Add one or more payment terms for this offer.
descriptions.actionType: Choose the purpose of this operation (e.g., install or replace the equipment)
descriptions.equipment: Choose the type of {{category}} used in the system
descriptions.equipmentLocation: Specify the exact physical location of the equipment within the plant
